title: Tag an Article for the Archive
description: After a story is published, an archivist needs to add relevant metadata and tags to it before committing it to the long-term digital archive.

tasks.description: Read the article to identify the key people, places, organizations, and topics mentioned.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of key entities in the story.

tasks.description: Enter these key entities as tags in the archive management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is tagged with relevant metadata.

tasks.description: Commit the article and its tags to the permanent archive.
tasks.expected_outcome: The story is successfully archived and is now searchable by its new tags.
